## About this project

This combined data from various sources listed below. The overall project is supported by NOAA's [Gulf of Mexico Integrated Ecosystem Assessment Program](https://www.integratedecosystemassessment.noaa.gov/regions/gulf-mexico).


## Data sources


### FCWC

Florida Commercial Watermen's Conservation ([FCWC](https://floridawatermen.org))


### NOAA OAR

NOAA Atlantic Oceanographic and Meterological Laboratory's [South Florida Ecosystem Restoration Research Cruises](https://www.aoml.noaa.gov/so-flo-ecosystem-restoration/)


### NOAA NMFS

NOAA Southeast Fisheries Science Center's [Population and Ecosystem Monitoring](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/about/population-and-ecosystem-monitoring)
